home.title: LIA Admin Assistant
home.subtitle: Your comprehensive business management solution
home.description: Streamline your workflow with our powerful admin dashboard. Manage tasks, appointments, finances, and more all in one place.
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who trust LIA Admin Assistant for their business management needs.

help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Get the help you need to make the most of LIA Admin Assistant
help.emailDescription: Get help via email within 24 hours
help.liveChatDescription: Chat with our support team in real-time
help.userGuideDescription: Complete guide to using the platform

faq1.question: How do I create my first task?
faq1.answer: To create your first task, go to the Tasks page and click the 'Add Task' button. Fill in the task details including title, description, priority, and due date, then click 'Create Task'.

faq2.question: How can I schedule an appointment?
faq2.answer: Navigate to the Appointments page and click 'Add Appointment'. Fill in the appointment details including title, date, time, and location. You can also set it as an all-day event if needed.

faq3.question: How do I track my expenses?
faq3.answer: Go to the Finance page and click 'Add Transaction'. Select 'Expense' as the type, enter the amount, choose a category, and add a description. The system will automatically categorize and track your expenses.

faq4.question: Can I change the language of the interface?
faq4.answer: Yes! Go to Settings and select your preferred language from the Language dropdown. The interface will immediately update to your chosen language.

faq5.question: How do I reset my password?
faq5.answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot Password?' and enter your email address. You'll receive an email with instructions to reset your password securely.

docs.gettingStartedDescription: Start your journey with our comprehensive getting started guide and learn how to make the most of all features.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionContent: At LIA Admin Assistant, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.
privacy.dataCollectionContent:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This includes:

• Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
• Account credentials and preferences
• Content you create (tasks, appointments, transactions)
• Communication data when you contact us

We also automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns to improve our services.
privacy.dataUsageContent:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process transactions and send related information
• Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
• Respond to your comments and questions
• Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends
• Personalize your experience and provide relevant content
• Ensure security and prevent fraud
privacy.dataSharingContent:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

• With your explicit consent
• To comply with legal obligations
• To protect our rights and prevent fraud
• In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
• With service providers who assist us in operating our platform (under strict confidentiality agreements)
privacy.dataSecurityContent:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:

• Encryption of data in transit and at rest
• Regular security assessments and updates
• Access controls and authentication measures
• Employee training on data protection
• Incident response procedures
privacy.userRightsContent:
You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

• Access: Request a copy of your personal data
• Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
• Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
• Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
• Restriction: Limit how we process your data
• Objection: Object to certain processing activities

To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@liaadmin.com
privacy.cookiesContent:
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze usage patterns. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us:

• Remember your preferences and settings
• Analyze how you use our services
• Provide personalized content
• Improve security and prevent fraud

You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
privacy.thirdPartyContent:
Our services may contain links to third-party websites or integrate with third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

Third-party services we may use include:
• Analytics providers
• Payment processors
• Cloud storage services
• Communication tools
privacy.updatesContent:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by:

• Posting the updated policy on our website
• Sending an email notification
• Displaying a notice in our application

Your continued use of our services after such updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
